# Publishers.BufferingStrategy.dropNewest

**Case**

When the buffer is full, discard the newly received element.

## Declaration

```swift
case dropNewest
```

## Buffering strategies

- **Publishers.BufferingStrategy.dropOldest**: When the buffer is full, discard the oldest element in the buffer.
- **Publishers.BufferingStrategy.customError(_:)**: When the buffer is full, execute the closure to provide a custom error.

items.description: When the buffer is full, discard the oldest element in the buffer.
